Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin select @Price = (select Price from Products where ProductId=@ProductId) update OrderDetail set Price=@Price*@Quantity where ProductId=@ProductId end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @result int
DELETE Orders WHERE OrderId=@OrderId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GetYourOrderDetails] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @DATE DATE=GETDATE() DECLARE @DATETIME2 DATE=GETDATE()+2 BEGIN
INSERT INTO Orders (ProductId,CustomerId,OrderDate,OrderDeliveryDate,Status) Values(@ProductId, @CustomerId,@DATE,@DATETIME2,@Status)
END
exec SP_InsertOrder 'P0002','100','0' select * from Orders

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
INSERT INTO Products ( ProductName, CategoryId, Description, Price, Quantity, Image ) Values(@ProductName, @CategoryId,@Description,@Price,@Quantity,@Image)
SELECT CAST(SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS INT)
END
--Exec SP_InsertProduct 'Mobile','1','Happy Life','20000.',1,'image'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * From Products WHERE ProductId Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR ProductName Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR CategoryId Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Description Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Price Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Quantity Like '%'+@keyword+'%'
END
--exec SP_SearchProductByKeyword 'P0'
--select * from Product

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE AddToCart SET CustomerId=@CustomerId, ProductId=@ProductId, Price=@Price, Quantity=@Quantity
WHERE CartId=@CartId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateCartById '100'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE Shipping SET ShippingId=@ShippingId, OrderId=@OrderId, ShippingAddress=@ShippingAddress, ContactNumber=@ContactNumber
WHERE ShippingId=@ShippingId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @DATE DATE=GETDATE() DECLARE @DATETIME2 DATE=GETDATE()+2 BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE Orders SET ProductId = @ProductId, CustomerId = @CustomerId, Status = @Status
WHERE CustomerId=@CustomerId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateProductById '100'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE AddToCart SET PaymentModeId=@PaymentModeId, ModeOfPayment=@ModeOfPayment
WHERE PaymentModeId=@PaymentModeId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE Products SET ProductName=@ProductName, CategoryId=@CategoryId, Descriptions=@Descriptions, Price=@Price, Quantity=@Quantity, Images=@Images WHERE ProductId=@ProductId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateProductById '1'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE EmailId = @EmailId AND Password =@Password END
